name: Laurel Coronet
title: Raincaller's Emblem: Laurel Coronet
desc: "There is a time appointed for all things to live and die, and the cycle continues on forever."

skills.desc:
When a character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Dendro Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
